## Xml.workspaceToDom() function

Encode a block tree as XML.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function workspaceToDom(workspace: Workspace, opt_noId?: boolean): Element;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [Workspace](./blockly.workspace.md) | The workspace containing blocks. |
|  opt\_noId | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> True if the encoder should skip the block IDs. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Element
